message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. We are currently offering this exclusive item for $2000000. Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
